mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_admin (admin_id, name, password, created_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{name}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_admin SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, modified_time = now() WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.select: SELECT admin_no , admin_id , name , password , modified_time , created_time FROM tb_admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
